  • Constructor Details

    • Pizza

      public Pizza(ArrayList<Topping> toppings, Size size, Sauce sauce, boolean extraSauce, boolean extraCheese, double price)
      Constructor method to create new deluxe pizza object
      Parameters:
      toppings - initial toppings for the pizza (only called by subclasses)
      size - pizza size
      sauce - pizza sauce
      extraSauce - if there's extra sauce
      extraCheese - if there's extra cheese
      price - final price
